mainboard.name: Lightning Bolt
mainboard.oracle_text: Lightning Bolt deals 3 damage to any target.

mainboard.name: Journey to Nowhere
mainboard.oracle_text:
When Journey to Nowhere enters the battlefield, exile target creature.
When Journey to Nowhere leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

mainboard.name: Bone Shards
mainboard.oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature or discard a card.
Destroy target creature or planeswalker.

mainboard.name: Sacred Foundry
mainboard.oracle_text:
({T}: Add {R} or {W}.)
As Sacred Foundry enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.

mainboard.oracle_text: When Perilous Myr dies, it deals 2 damage to any target.

mainboard.name: Swans of Bryn Argoll
mainboard.oracle_text:
Flying
If a source would deal damage to Swans of Bryn Argoll, prevent that damage. The source's controller draws cards equal to the damage prevented this way.

mainboard.name: Foreboding Ruins
mainboard.oracle_text:
As Foreboding Ruins enters the battlefield, you may reveal a Swamp or Mountain card from your hand. If you don't, Foreboding Ruins enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {B} or {R}.

mainboard.name: Quest for the Gravelord
mainboard.oracle_text:
Whenever a creature dies, you may put a quest counter on Quest for the Gravelord.
Remove three quest counters from Quest for the Gravelord and sacrifice it: Create a 5/5 black Zombie Giant creature token.

mainboard.name: Vampire Aristocrat
mainboard.oracle_text: Sacrifice a creature: Vampire Aristocrat gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

mainboard.name: Path to Exile
mainboard.oracle_text: Exile target creature. Its controller may search their library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

mainboard.name: Reckless Rage
mainboard.oracle_text: Reckless Rage deals 4 damage to target creature you don't control and 2 damage to target creature you control.

mainboard.name: Punishing Fire
mainboard.oracle_text:
Punishing Fire deals 2 damage to any target.
Whenever an opponent gains life, you may pay {R}. If you do, return Punishing Fire from your graveyard to your hand.

mainboard.name: Dragonskull Summit
mainboard.oracle_text:
Dragonskull Summit enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Swamp or a Mountain.
{T}: Add {B} or {R}.

mainboard.name: Pitiless Pontiff
mainboard.oracle_text: {1}, Sacrifice another creature: Pitiless Pontiff gains deathtouch and indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)

mainboard.name: Agonizing Remorse
mainboard.oracle_text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it or a card from their graveyard. Exile that card. You lose 1 life.

mainboard.name: Eidolon of Obstruction
mainboard.oracle_text:
First strike
Loyalty abilities of planeswalkers your opponents control cost {1} more to activate.

mainboard.name: Chain Lightning
mainboard.oracle_text: Chain Lightning deals 3 damage to any target. Then that player or that permanent's controller may pay {R}{R}. If the player does, they may copy this spell and may choose a new target for that copy.

Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)

sideboard.name: Cauldron of Souls
sideboard.oracle_text: {T}: Choose any number of target creatures. Each of those creatures gains persist until end of turn. (When it dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)

sideboard.oracle_text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Scalding Tarn: Search your library for an Island or Mountain card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

sideboard.oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.

sideboard.oracle_text: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn. Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.

Menace
Modular 2 (This creature enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it. When it dies, you may put its +1/+1 counters on target artifact creature.)

sideboard.name: Mogg War Marshal

sideboard.name: Patrol Signaler
